itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Emerald.

item.name: Emerald Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with an Emerald.

item.name: Melted Silver Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silver Ore.

item.name: Emerald
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Emerald.

item.name: Forest Emerald Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Forest Emerald.
